Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

blancocentR 1.0.1

2025-11-05

  • theme_la_first() now defaults to the correct font name “Univers”.

blancocentR 1.0.0

2025-10-31

  • Reduced package dependencies: blancocentR requires packages or package versions only for select functions.
  • Most themes require fonts to be installed on the user’s system: “Quicksand” and “Bitter” for all “BC” themes (except theme_bc_legacy()), and “Univers” for theme_lafirst().
  • gt_theme_bc() now available but is still experimental.
  • gradients() function now available.
  • theme_bc() now supports arguments ink, paper, and accent released in ggplot2 4.0.0 update and requires ggplot2 4.0.0 or higher. Arguments to define font families are now congruent with ggplot2 naming convention (base_family and header_family).
  • Original theme_bc() now available as theme_bc_legacy() and requires ggplot2 3.5 or higher. If you rely on the original structure, please replace any calls to theme_bc() with theme_bc_legacy() in your workflow.
  • theme_la_first() now available and requires ggplot2 3.5 or higher.
  • New data: datasets parishes and louisiana are now available in long format under parishes_long and louisiana_long.
  • New colors: LA FIRST colors are now available as exported objects.

blancocentR 0.0.9

2025-02-19

  • Initial GitHub submission.
